Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class Market

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.observer.Observable<IServerPacket>
it.polimi.ingsw.model.Market
public class Market
extends Observable<IServerPacket>
Model class representing the game market. Notifies all registered observer of state updates.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    Market()
    Constructs an empty market.

    Shifts the given column up, inserting the slide marble in the bottom position and moving the marble in the top position in the slide.
    void shiftRow​(int row)
    Shifts the given row to the left, inserting the slide marble in the rightmost position and moving the marble in the leftmost position in the slide.

  • Constructor Details

    • Market

      public Market()
      Constructs an empty market.

  • Method Details

    • initializeMarket

      public void initializeMarket()
      Initializes the market with randomized marbles in each box. The market always contains the following marbles:
      • 2 COIN
      • 2 STONE
      • 2 SHIELD
      • 2 SERVANT
      • 1 FAITH
      • 4 WHITE
      Each marble represents a Resource, except for WHITE that represent no resource (in the data structure this is stored as null).

    • getRow

      public java.util.List<Resource> getRow​(int row)
      Gets a List of resources corresponding to the marbles in the given row.
      Parameters:
      row - the index of the row, valid values are between 0 and 2, where 0 represents the top row and 2 the bottom row
      Returns:
      a list of the resources contained in the given row

    • getColumn

      public java.util.List<Resource> getColumn​(int column)
      Gets a List of resources corresponding to the marbles in the given column.
      Parameters:
      column - the index of the column, valid values are between 0 and 3, where 0 represents the leftmost column and 3 the rightmost column
      Returns:
      a list of the resources contained in the given column

    • shiftRow

      public void shiftRow​(int row)
      Shifts the given row to the left, inserting the slide marble in the rightmost position and moving the marble in the leftmost position in the slide.
      Parameters:
      row - the index of the row to shift, valid values are between 0 and 2, where 0 represents the top row and 2 the bottom row

    • shiftColumn

      public void shiftColumn​(int column)
      Shifts the given column up, inserting the slide marble in the bottom position and moving the marble in the top position in the slide.
      Parameters:
      column - the index of the column to shift, valid values are between 0 and 3, where 0 represents the leftmost column and 3 the rightmost column

    • notifyCreation

      public void notifyCreation()
